ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Recall context for survey
Notes: e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on your friendships, social life, home life or marriage?
[nas_recall] - Was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on your financial position, work or job opportunities?
[nas_recall] - Was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on your outlook on life?
[nas_recall] - Was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on your health?
Felt your drinking had a harmful effort on your health - Did this happen during the last 12 months?
About what age were you when your drinking first had a harmful effect on your health?
Did your drinking change after your health was harmed by drinking?
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? I increased how often I drink
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? I increased how much I drink
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? I reduced how often I drink
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? I reduced how much I drink
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? I quit drinking
How did your drinking change after the harmful effects started? No answer
How long did you quit drinking after the harmful effects started?
Notes: 1 = Less than a month; 2 = One to six months; 3 = Seven months to one year; 4 = Longer than a year; 5 = I still do not drink; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: When did your drinking have these harmful effects? - 11+ years ago
When did your drinking have these harmful effects? - no response
Would you say that your drinking has bothered anyone at all in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Don't know; 888 = No response

ElementDescription: Overall, on a scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is a little and 10 is a lot, how much would you say your drinking has negatively affected other people in the last 12 months?
Now thinking of your entire lifetime, was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on - Your friendships and social life?
Now thinking of your entire lifetime, was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on - Your home life or marriage?
Now thinking of your entire lifetime, was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on - Your financial position?
Now thinking of your entire lifetime, was there ever a time when you felt your drinking had a harmful effect on - Your work and employment opportunities?
When did your drinking have these harmful effects? - Within the past 12 months
When did your drinking have these harmful effects? - 1-5 years ago
When did your drinking have these harmful effects? - 6-10 years ago
